source.query:
select FUNCTION_ID from migration_portalProcess_RTO
 where rto_id is null;

query.value:
with tempRTO as (
select id, seconds, description, newImpactTimespanId
 from migration_rto_intervals
where description = '@{activity('Get RP Process').output.rto}'
LIMIT 1)

update migration_portalProcess_RTO
set rto_id = (select id from tempRTO),
rto_seconds = (select seconds from tempRTO),
rto_description = (select description from tempRTO),
newImpactTimespanId = (select newImpactTimespanId from tempRTO)
where FUNCTION_ID = @{activity('Get RP Process').output.id};

select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';

source.query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_portalProcess_RTO;

CREATE TABLE migration_portalProcess_RTO AS
(select * from
(select 
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY pp.portalProcessId ORDER BY rto.seconds) rn,
pp.FUNCTION_ID,
pp.portalProcessId,
rto.id rto_id,
rto.seconds rto_seconds,
rto.description rto_description,
rto.newImpactTimespanId
 from
 migration_portalProcess_data pp
left join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY functStrategy on pp.FUNCTION_ID = functStrategy.FUNCTION_ID
left join migration_rto_intervals rto on rto.id = functStrategy.rto_id
)
 minRTOs
where rn = 1);

select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';

select portalProcessId,
newImpactTimespanId
 from migration_portalProcess_RTO where rto_id is not null

value.value:
update bcPortalProcess
set rtoImpactTimespanId = '@{item().newImpactTimespanId}'
where portalProcessId = '@{item().portalProcessId}'

insert into bcImpactTimespan
(impactTimespanId,
timespanName,
impactTimespanStatusTypeId,
portalId,
timespanInSeconds,
timespanDuration,
timespanDurationUnitId,
dateTimeCreated,
createdById)
VALUES
(
    '@{item().newImpactTimespanId}',
    '@{item().description}',
    'e37def28-175b-4543-89b4-af86220f1bba',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
    @{item().seconds},
    @{item().timespanDuration},
    '@{item().timespanDurationUnitId}',
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
)

insert into bcImpactTimespanTranslation
(impactTimespanTranslationId,
impactTimespanId,
timespanName,
languageCode,
dateTimeCreated,
createdById)
values
(
    NEWID(),
    '@{item().newImpactTimespanId}',
    '@{item().description}',
    'en',
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
)

source.query:
-- Seconds In Day = 86400

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_rto_intervals;

CREATE TABLE migration_rto_intervals AS (

with temp as
(select 
id,
uuid() newImpactTimespanId,
substring(description, 1, 20) description,
(FRAME_END_HOURS * 3600) +
(FRAME_END_DAYS * 86400) +
(FRAME_END_WEEKS * 86400 * 7) +
(FRAME_END_MONTHS * 86400 * 30) seconds
 from t_recovery_time_objective)

select t.*,
case when unit = 'days' then seconds DIV (3600 * 24) else
    case when unit = 'hours' then seconds DIV 3600 else 100 end end timespanDuration,
case when unit = 'days' then '0cab3e34-0f19-4cc6-b580-cc8dc70af2d5' else
    case when unit = 'hours' then '41bb6fc1-df74-42b5-8f41-e55e5a4570ed' else '9372a9f2-4391-4a8b-80ec-9c6150a48f23' end end timespanDurationUnitId
 from
(select id, newImpactTimespanId, description, seconds,
IF ((seconds / 86400) != CONVERT(seconds / 86400, UNSIGNED), 'hours', 'days') unit
 from temp
 UNION
 select
 -1,
 uuid() newImpactTimespanId,
 substring((select CONCAT(temp.description, ' +')
 from temp
 where seconds = (select max(seconds) from temp)), 1, 20) description,
  3153600000 seconds,
  'years' unit) t
);

select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';

ifTrueActivities.name: Update
ifTrueActivities.description:
Update ITDR customFieldName to the pattern technologyName_customFieldName.
This is done because RP does not support sharing of the custom fields between technologies and may have the same name, but different options, for example.

   from t_detailed_outage_impact_type t
   order by numericValue
   limit 9;

insert into bcOverrideSystemImpactCategories
(overrideSystemImpactCategoryId,
portalId,
impactCategoryId,
categoryName,
categoryColor,
categoryDescription,
dateTimeCreated,
createdById)
VALUES
(
    '@{item().overrideSystemImpactCategoryId}',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
    (select impactCategoryId from bcImpactCategory where sequenceNbr = @{item().numericValue}),
    '@{item().name}',
    (select categoryColor from bcImpactCategory where sequenceNbr = @{item().numericValue}),
    '@{item().description}',
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
);

insert into bcImpactCategoryTranslation
(
    impactCategoryTranslationId,
    impactCategoryId,
    categoryName,
    categoryDescription,
    languageCode,
    overrideSystemImpactCategoryId,
    dateTimeCreated,
    createdById
)
values
(
    NEWID(),
    (select impactCategoryId from bcImpactCategory where sequenceNbr = @{item().numericValue}),
    '@{item().name}',
    '@{item().description}',
    'en',
    '@{item().overrideSystemImpactCategoryId}',
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
)

insert into bcExcludedSystemImpactCategories
(excludedSystemImpactCatogoryId,
portalId,
impactCategoryId,
dateTimeCreated,
createdById)
SELECT
NEWID(),
'@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
ic.impactCategoryId,
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
'@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
FROM 
bcImpactCategory ic
left join (
   SELECT impactCategoryId
   from bcOverrideSystemImpactCategories
   where portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}}') osic on osic.impactCategoryId = ic.impactCategoryId
where osic.impactCategoryId is null

    , entityId
    , userId
    , isPrimaryRelationship
    , dateTimeCreated
    , createdById)

    , '@{item().preparisUserId}'

    , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

END

source.query:
SELECT 
    (SELECT uuid()) as newUserId
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId_portal
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId_location
    , IFNULL(c.name,'') as username
    , c.firstName
    , c.middleInitials
    , c.lastName
    , case u.role when 0 then 'SYSTEM' when 1 then 'PARTNER' when 2 THEN 'ADMIN' when 3 then 'MANAGER' when 4 then 'USER' when 5 then 'LISTED' end AS role
    , case u.status when 0 then 'ACTIVE' when 1 then 'INACTIVE' when 2 then 'LOCKED' when 3 then 'TERMINATED' end AS status
    , ct.name
    , ci.email
    , ci.primaryEmail
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line1, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line1
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line2, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line2
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.city, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) city
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.state, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) state
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.zip, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) zip
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.numberString, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) numberString
    , cic.name as contactInfoCountry
    , ct.NAME as contactTypeName
    , s.name as siteName
    , sc.name as siteCountryName
    , us.floor
    , us.room
    , us.seat
    , u.currentLoginAttempts
    , IFNULL(u.password,'') as password
    , u.passwordExpired
    , u.passwordLastUpdated
    , u.twoFactorAuth
    , u.twoFactorAuthSecret
    , u.creationdate
    , cast(s.latitude as float) as latitude
    , cast(s.longitude as float) as longitude
    , u.timezone
    , c.externalID
    , case u.timezone 
        when 'UTC' then '8fa8449a-4be5-4b8c-9bcd-c7f378a9f438'
        when 'JST' then '8702ab86-8acc-468d-a735-f5ab8c8de4d5'
        when 'CST' OR 'America/Chicago' then '19a4144b-76bd-42fd-baa8-bb528a814884'
        when 'EST' OR 'America/New_York' then 'c16ab931-6dfa-40b0-ac2a-e404e725c8b9'
        else concat('TimeZone', u.timezone, ' Not Yet Mapped')
        END  as timeZoneId
FROM T_CONTACT c
LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.id = u.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON c.id = ci.owner_id
JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
JOIN T_USER_SITE us ON u.id = us.user_id
JOIN T_SITE s on us.site_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY sc on s.country_id = sc.id 
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY cic on ci.country_id = cic.id

text.value:
INSERT INTO [dbo].[azstudioSecurityUsers]
           ([userId]
           ,[userName]
           ,[passwordHash]
           ,[userStateId]
           ,[dateTimeCreated]
           ,[createdById]
           ,[dateTimeLastModified]
           ,[lastModifiedById]
           ,[passwordResetRequired]
           ,[lat]
           ,[lng]
           ,[consecutiveFailedLoginAttempts]
           ,[dateTimePasswordLockout]
           ,[externalSystemId]
           ,[timeZoneId]
           ,[seed]
           ,[isFullyMigrated]
           ,[isSelfRegistered]
           ,[dateTimePasswordLastModified])
SELECT '@{item().newUserId}' as newUserId
, '@{item().username}' as username
, '@{item().password}' as password
, case when '@{item().role}' = 'LISTED' then '@{variables('userStateId_Active')}' else '@{variables('userStateId_Pending')}' end as userStateId
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimeCreated
, '@{variables('CreatedByGUID')}' as createdById
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimeLastModified
, '@{variables('CreatedByGUID')}' as lastModifiedById
, 1 as passwordResetRequired
, @{item().latitude} as lat
, @{item().longitude} as lng
, 0 as consecutiveFailedLoginAttempts
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimePasswordLockout
, '@{item().externalId}' as externalSystemId
, '@{item().timeZoneId}' as timeZoneId
, '' as seed
, 0 as isFullyMigrated
, 0 as isSelfRegistered
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimePasswordLastModified

source.query:
SELECT 
    (SELECT uuid()) as newUserId
    , concat("'",IFNULL(c.name,''),"'") as username
    , c.firstName
    , c.middleInitials
    , c.lastName
    , case u.role when 0 then 'SYSTEM' when 1 then 'PARTNER' when 2 THEN 'ADMIN' when 3 then 'MANAGER' when 4 then 'USER' when 5 then 'LISTED' end AS role
    , case u.status when 0 then 'ACTIVE' when 1 then 'INACTIVE' when 2 then 'LOCKED' when 3 then 'TERMINATED' end AS status
    , ct.name
    , ci.email
    , ci.primaryEmail
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line1, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line1
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line2, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line2
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.city, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) city
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.state, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) state
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.zip, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) zip
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.numberString, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) numberString
    , cic.name as contactInfoCountry
    , ct.NAME as contactTypeName
    , s.name as siteName
    , sc.name as siteCountryName
    , us.floor
    , us.room
    , us.seat
    , u.currentLoginAttempts
    , concat("'",IFNULL(u.password,''),"'") as password
    , u.passwordExpired
    , u.passwordLastUpdated
    , u.twoFactorAuth
    , u.twoFactorAuthSecret
    , u.creationdate
    , cast(s.latitude as float) as latitude
    , cast(s.longitude as float) as longitude
    , u.timezone
    , c.externalID
    , case u.timezone 
        when 'UTC' then '8fa8449a-4be5-4b8c-9bcd-c7f378a9f438'
        when 'JST' then '8702ab86-8acc-468d-a735-f5ab8c8de4d5'
        when 'CST' OR 'America/Chicago' then '19a4144b-76bd-42fd-baa8-bb528a814884'
        when 'EST' OR 'America/New_York' then 'c16ab931-6dfa-40b0-ac2a-e404e725c8b9'
        else concat('TimeZone', u.timezone, ' Not Yet Mapped')
        END  as timeZoneId
FROM T_CONTACT c
LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.id = u.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON c.id = ci.owner_id
JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
JOIN T_USER_SITE us ON u.id = us.user_id
JOIN T_SITE s on us.site_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY sc on s.country_id = sc.id 
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY cic on ci.country_id = cic.id

activities.name: ForEach Custom Field Option in Batch

source.query:
/*custom field type mapping*/
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_types_mapping;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_types_mapping as
(
select a.rp_area_type, a.rp_descr, a.preparis_type, a.preparis_descr
from
(select t.* from
(values
row(5, 'user', '0741ab49-72f7-4555-b93c-b462cbd96007', 'User'),
row(19, 'function', '72bf9737-378a-4171-bfb1-deef31a7f9f9', 'Biusiness Continiuty'),
row(3, 'resource', 'ea473ce9-8796-4d7d-b74d-a154a56c1d5f', 'Biusiness Continiuty Technology')) t (rp_area_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)) a);

/*custom fields data types mapping*/
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping as
(
select a.rp_type, a.rp_descr, a.preparis_type, a.preparis_descr
from
(select t.* from
(values
row(10, 'DATE', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2', 'DateTime'),
row(2, 'ShortText', '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'ShortText'),
row(3, 'RADIO', 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875', 'SelectOne'),
row(0, 'PICKLIST', 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875', 'SelectOne'),
row(5, 'MULTISELECT', '76c83029-8439-42ad-90e6-7f0ff54b732c', 'SelectMany'),
row(1, 'CHECKBOX', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'TrueFalse'),
row(4, 'TEXTBOX', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', 'LongText'),
row(9, 'NUMERIC', '5f31785c-4d3c-4d68-a834-da37c2bc0a76', 'Numeric')) t (rp_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)) a);


/* Process custom fields */
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields as
(
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cf.id) row_num,
cf.id,
cf.areaType,
cf.name,
cf.required isRequired,
cfdtm.preparis_type customFieldDataTypeId,
cftm.preparis_type customFieldTypeId,
cf.possition displaySequence,
uuid() newCustomFieldId
from t_custom_field cf
join migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping cfdtm on cf.type = cfdtm.rp_type
join migration_custom_fields_types_mapping cftm on cf.areaType = cftm.rp_area_type);


/* process custom fields options */
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_options;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_options as
(
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cfch.id) row_num,
cfch.id,
cfch.field_id,
mcf.areaType,
cfch.name optionName,
cfch.possition displaySequence,
0 isDefault,
'b5da6970-6125-4904-b87f-c39187d4fd8a' customFieldOptionStatusTypeId /*Active*/,
mcf.newCustomFieldId,
uuid() newCustomFieldOptionId
 from migration_custom_fields mcf
join t_custom_field_choice cfch on mcf.id = cfch.field_id);


select count(*) cfCount from migration_custom_fields;

activities.name: ForEach Custom Field in batch
activities.description: For Each Recovery Planner User Custom Field Batch

dependsOn.activity: LUP Migration Tables Custom Fields Values

activities.name: LUP Migration Tables Custom Fields Values

source.query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_strategy_custom_fields_values;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_strategy_custom_fields_values as
(
select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) row_num, t.*
    from
    (select
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c'/*ShortText*/ then convert(cv.text, char(4000)) else
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792'/*TrueFalse*/ then convert((cv.checked = 1), char(4000)) else
        case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a'/*LongText*/ then convert(cv.textArea, char(4000)) else
            case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2'/*DateTime*/ then convert(cv.date, char(4000)) 
                end end end end userValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where mcf.areaType = 19
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId in ('0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2')
union
-- add picklist values
    select 
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    convert(cfc.name, char(4000)) userValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join t_custom_field_choice cfc on cv.choice_id = cfc.id
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where user_id is not null
    and mcf.areaType = 19
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875' /*PICKLIST*/) t);

select count(*) customFieldsCount from migration_strategy_custom_fields_values;

dependsOn.activity: LUP Migration Tables Custom Fields Values

activities.name: EP Create Custom Fields User Values
LUP Migration Tables Custom Fields Values

source.query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_user_custom_fields_values;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_user_custom_fields_values as
(
select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) row_num, t.*
    from
    (select
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c'/*ShortText*/ then convert(cv.text, char(4000)) else
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792'/*TrueFalse*/ then convert((cv.checked = 1), char(4000)) else
        case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a'/*LongText*/ then convert(cv.textArea, char(4000)) else
            case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2'/*DateTime*/ then convert(cv.date, char(4000)) 
                end end end end fieldValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where mcf.areaType = 5
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId in ('0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2')
union
-- add picklist values
    select 
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    convert(cfc.name, char(4000)) fieldValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join t_custom_field_choice cfc on cv.choice_id = cfc.id
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where user_id is not null
    and mcf.areaType = 5
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875' /*PICKLIST*/) t);

select count(*) customFieldsCount from migration_user_custom_fields_values;

activities.name: Copy Plan from RP to Blob

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select documentId from ppdocsDocuments 
where documentName = '@{pipeline().parameters.plan_name}'
and folderId = '@{pipeline().parameters.preparisFolderGuid}'
and documentStateId = 'a615996c-640f-47d1-948a-4a3cb1bc7766'
and owningAccountId = '@{pipeline().parameters.preparisUserId}'

dependsOn.activity: Copy Plan from RP to Blob

text.value:
INSERT INTO ppdocsDocumentHistory
    (documentHistoryId,documentId,archivedDocumentId,documentHistoryEventTypeId,additionalDetails,dateTimeCreated,createdById)
VALUES(
    '@{guid()}'
    ,'@{variables('thisDocumentId')}'
    ,'@{guid()}'
    ,'46004597-7A44-434C-9792-5B763FDA45BD'
    ,'Migration from Recovery Planner'
    ,GETDATE()
    ,'@{pipeline().parameters.preparisUserId}'
)

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ppdocsDocuments WHERE documentId = '@{variables('thisDocumentId')}') 
BEGIN
  INSERT INTO ppdocsDocuments
  (documentId,documentName,documentFileName,description,documentStateId,folderId,owningAccountId,sizeInBytes,versionInfo,tagsJson,metadataJson,dateTimeCreated,createdById)
  VALUES
  ('@{variables('thisDocumentId')}'
  ,'@{pipeline().parameters.plan_name}'
  ,'@{pipeline().parameters.plan_name}.zip'
  ,NULL
  ,'a615996c-640f-47d1-948a-4a3cb1bc7766'
  ,'@{pipeline().parameters.preparisFolderGuid}'
  ,'@{pipeline().parameters.preparisUserId}'
  ,@{activity('Copy Plan from RP to Blob').output.dataWritten}
  ,null
  ,NULL
  ,NULL
  ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  ,'@{pipeline().parameters.preparisUserId}');
END
ELSE
BEGIN
  UPDATE ppdocsDocuments
  SET documentName = '@{pipeline().parameters.plan_name}',
        documentFileName = '@{pipeline().parameters.plan_name}.zip',
        description = NULL,
        documentStateId = 'a615996c-640f-47d1-948a-4a3cb1bc7766',
        folderId = '@{pipeline().parameters.preparisFolderGuid}',
        owningAccountId = '@{pipeline().parameters.preparisUserId}',
        sizeInBytes = @{activity('Copy Plan from RP to Blob').output.dataWritten},
        versionInfo = NULL,
        tagsJson = NULL,
        metadataJson = NULL,
        lastModifiedById = '@{pipeline().parameters.preparisUserId}',
        dateTimeLastModified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE documentId = '@{variables('thisDocumentId')}'
END
